channel.title: How would i do this ON a 307 server. Making people, and me Admins+ editing stats
channel.description: Im wondering on a 307 server How do I make me and other people admins/mods. Also how do I edit my stats, So like I can press a button, edit them, or make a command that only admins can use to have 99 in all stats? And were would I add this command? thanks.

item.title: How would i do this ON a 307 server. Making people, and me Admins+ editing stats
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

The Hunt, The next topic I see that is really easy to me that is made by you, I’ll flame you.

@ontopic

It’s a 317 server.

Just follow some guidelines and use the search bar

item.title: How would i do this ON a 307 server. Making people, and me Admins+ editing stats
item.dc:creator: @str_by_zammy str by zammy
item.description:
@str_by_zammy wrote:

Something like

if(command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights > 2 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kookajamo")) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; c.disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is now a Moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Meaning, if your name is ‘Kookajamo’ then you can use the ::givemod (playername) command if they are online.

Read full topic
item.source: How would i do this ON a 307 server. Making people, and me Admins+ editing stats

item.title: How would i do this ON a 307 server. Making people, and me Admins+ editing stats
item.dc:creator: @johnpk johnpk
item.description:
@johnpk wrote:

[quote=“the hunt, post:1, topic:291139”][quote author=johnpk link=topic=384859.msg2886710#msg2886710 date=1248656893]
go into your character file then go to characters, it will say rights and it will be 0, make them 3 and to make you have stats, it will say player level or something and just change the exp to like 999999999 and then make it 99, then save, then no need to compile, just make sure your logged out when you do this, or the other person.
[/quote]

o u smart i didun no that.[/quote]at least i help people, unlike you flaming every post on the help section

Read full topic
